title: Who should I get Mastery 6/7 on?
body:
I asked a few friends and I go two, {{champion:163}}  {{champion:6}}  and both are solid choices the were equally supported.

Who should I get them S's on?

replies.body: Everyone... leave no doubt that you know your champion.
Never played either; but it came up in a conversation in which it was mentioned that I've never been bad with a champion, so I let them challenge me, which I brought to the boards.
you need a voting option for both

Urgot, hes getting reworked soon, so get mastery 7 urgot so you can say you mastered pre rework urgot, and that YOU ARE A TRUE URGOD!!!!

Also shouldi try for mast 7 on {{champion:90}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:98}} or  {{champion:45}} ?
Definitely Zilean, you'll love trolling the enemy super hard.

> [{quoted}](name=PureSilvrr,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7ZGitEsf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-07T02:50:10.604+0000)
>
> Urgot, hes getting reworked soon, so get mastery 7 urgot so you can say you mastered pre rework urgot, and that YOU ARE A TRUE URGOD!!!!
> 
> Also shouldi try for mast 7 on {{champion:90}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:98}} or  {{champion:45}} ?

Twisted Fate.
